Symptoms: Runny nose, sneezing, sore throat, cough, mild fever, headache
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Tulsi (Holy Basil) tea, ginger-honey mixture, steam inhalation with eucalyptus oil, Sitopaladi churna, Talisadi churna
Homeopathic_Treatment: Allium cepa (for watery eyes and runny nose), Arsenicum album (for burning nasal discharge), Natrum muriaticum (for clear nasal discharge), Pulsatilla (for thick yellow-green discharge)
Allopathic_Treatment: Rest, fluids, OTC decongestants, antihistamines, NSAIDs for fever and pain relief

Symptoms: High fever, body aches, fatigue, headache, dry cough, sore throat
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Turmeric milk, ginger-tulsi decoction, honey with black pepper, Tribhuvankirti ras, Sudarsana churna
Homeopathic_Treatment: Oscillococcinum, Gelsemium (for exhaustion and chills), Bryonia (for dry cough and body pain), Eupatorium perfoliatum (for deep bone pain)
Allopathic_Treatment: Antiviral medications (oseltamivir, zanamivir), NSAIDs, rest, fluids, acetaminophen

Symptoms: Chest pain, productive cough, fever, shortness of breath, fatigue
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Sitopaladi churna, Talisadi churna, Yashtimadhu (licorice), Vasa leaf decoction, warm mustard oil chest massage
Homeopathic_Treatment: Antimonium tartaricum (for rattling cough), Phosphorus (for burning chest pain), Bryonia (for sharp chest pain), Kali carbonicum (for weakness and lower chest pain)
Allopathic_Treatment: Antibiotics, antivirals for viral pneumonia, oxygen therapy if needed, bronchodilators, expectorants

Symptoms: Persistent cough with mucus, chest discomfort, fatigue, mild fever
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Kantakari (Solanum xanthocarpum), honey with ginger juice, Sitopaladi churna, Talisadi churna, steam inhalation
Homeopathic_Treatment: Antimonium tartaricum (for rattling cough), Bryonia (for dry, painful cough), Pulsatilla (for loose cough with yellow-green discharge), Rumex crispus (for dry cough worsened by cold air)
Allopathic_Treatment: Antibiotics (if bacterial), bronchodilators, cough suppressants, mucolytics, corticosteroids

Symptoms: Wheezing, shortness of breath, chest tightness, coughing
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Vasaka (Adhatoda vasica), Shirisha (Albizia lebbeck), Pushkarmool (Inula racemosa), Pranayama (breathing exercises), Chyawanprash
Homeopathic_Treatment: Arsenicum album (for anxiety with breathing difficulty), Ipecacuanha (for cough with nausea), Natrum sulphuricum (for asthma worsened by humidity), Blatta orientalis (for chronic asthma)
Allopathic_Treatment: Inhaled corticosteroids, bronchodilators (short and long-acting), leukotriene modifiers, biologics, oxygen therapy when needed

Symptoms: Sneezing, itchy nose/eyes/throat, watery eyes, runny nose
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Haridra (turmeric), Yashtimadhu (licorice), Guduchi (Tinospora cordifolia), Neti pot with saline water, Nasya therapy
Homeopathic_Treatment: Allium cepa (for watery eyes and runny nose), Euphrasia (for burning watery eyes), Sabadilla (for violent sneezing), Histaminum (for allergic symptoms)
Allopathic_Treatment: Antihistamines, nasal corticosteroids, decongestants, leukotriene receptor antagonists, immunotherapy

Symptoms: Persistent cough (often with blood), chest pain, weight loss, night sweats, fatigue
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Vasaka (Adhatoda vasica), Haridra (turmeric), Amalaki (Indian gooseberry), Pippali (long pepper), immune-boosting herbs like Guduchi
Homeopathic_Treatment: Tuberculinum, Phosphorus (for chronic cough with blood), Stannum metallicum (for weakness with sweating), Calcarea phosphorica (for emaciation)
Allopathic_Treatment: Antibiotics combination therapy (isoniazid, rifampin, ethambutol, pyrazinamide), extended treatment course (6+ months)

Symptoms: Often asymptomatic; headaches, shortness of breath, nosebleeds in severe cases
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Arjuna (Terminalia arjuna), Brahmi (Bacopa monnieri), Shankhpushpi (Convolvulus pluricaulis), Sarpagandha (Rauwolfia serpentina), yoga, meditation
Homeopathic_Treatment: Lachesis (for left-sided issues), Glonoinum (for violent throbbing headaches), Baryta carbonica (for elderly with hardening arteries), Crataegus (for heart weakness)
Allopathic_Treatment: ACE inhibitors, ARBs, beta-blockers, calcium channel blockers, diuretics, lifestyle modifications

Symptoms: Chest pain (angina), shortness of breath, fatigue, dizziness
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Arjuna (Terminalia arjuna), Pushkarmool (Inula racemosa), Guggulu (Commiphora mukul), Lashuna (garlic), specific yoga asanas
Homeopathic_Treatment: Crataegus (for heart weakness), Digitalis (for weak pulse), Cactus grandiflorus (for constricting chest pain), Latrodectus mactans (for radiating pain)
Allopathic_Treatment: Antiplatelet medications, statins, beta-blockers, nitrates, calcium channel blockers, surgical interventions (angioplasty, bypass surgery)

Symptoms: Shortness of breath, fatigue, swelling in legs/ankles, rapid heartbeat
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Arjuna (Terminalia arjuna), Punarnava (Boerhavia diffusa), Gokshura (Tribulus terrestris), heart-strengthening Rasayana formulations
Homeopathic_Treatment: Digitalis (for weak pulse with edema), Apocynum cannabinum (for edema with weak heart), Crataegus (for heart weakness), Adonis vernalis (for water retention)
Allopathic_Treatment: ACE inhibitors, ARBs, beta-blockers, diuretics, aldosterone antagonists, digoxin, biventricular pacemakers

Symptoms: Palpitations, racing heartbeat, chest discomfort, dizziness, fainting
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Arjuna (Terminalia arjuna), Shankhpushpi (Convolvulus pluricaulis), Brahmi (Bacopa monnieri), Jatamansi (Nardostachys jatamansi)
Homeopathic_Treatment: Digitalis (for irregular pulse), Lachesis (for palpitations worse during sleep), Spigelia (for sharp, stabbing pains), Crataegus (for heart irregularity)
Allopathic_Treatment: Antiarrhythmic medications, blood thinners, cardioversion, catheter ablation, pacemakers, implantable cardioverter-defibrillators

Symptoms: Swelling, pain, warmth, and redness in affected limb (usually leg)
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Lashuna (garlic), Maricha (black pepper), Turmeric, Triphala, gentle massage with medicated oils
Homeopathic_Treatment: Hamamelis (for venous congestion), Arnica montana (for trauma and pain), Lachesis (for left-sided issues), Vipera (for severe pain in affected area)
Allopathic_Treatment: Anticoagulants (heparin, warfarin, DOACs), thrombolytics, compression stockings, surgical interventions

Symptoms: Increased thirst/hunger, frequent urination, fatigue, blurred vision, slow-healing wounds
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Gurmar (Gymnema sylvestre), Neem (Azadirachta indica), Jamun (Syzygium cumini), Karela (bitter gourd), Triphala, Vijaysar
Homeopathic_Treatment: Uranium nitricum (for excessive urination and sugar), Phosphoric acid (for weakness), Syzygium jambolanum (for pancreatic support), Gymnema sylvestre (for sugar cravings)
Allopathic_Treatment: Metformin, sulfonylureas, DPP-4 inhibitors, SGLT2 inhibitors, GLP-1 receptor agonists, insulin therapy, lifestyle modifications

Symptoms: Fatigue, weight gain, cold intolerance, dry skin, constipation, depression
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Kanchanara (Bauhinia variegata), Guggulu, Jatamansi (Nardostachys jatamansi), Ashwagandha (Withania somnifera), Brahmi (Bacopa monnieri)
Homeopathic_Treatment: Thyroidinum, Calcarea carbonica (for cold intolerance and fatigue), Natrum muriaticum (for depression with thyroid issues), Fucus vesiculosus (seaweed extract)
Allopathic_Treatment: Levothyroxine (synthetic thyroid hormone replacement), regular monitoring and dose adjustments

Symptoms: Weight loss, increased heart rate, anxiety, tremors, heat intolerance, bulging eyes
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Apamarga (Achyranthes aspera), Kanchanara (Bauhinia variegata), Guduchi (Tinospora cordifolia), cooling herbs, stress-reducing practices
Homeopathic_Treatment: Iodum (for emaciation with hunger), Natrum muriaticum (for neck swelling), Lycopus (for rapid heart rate), Fucus vesiculosus (seaweed extract)
Allopathic_Treatment: Antithyroid medications (methimazole, propylthiouracil), beta-blockers, radioactive iodine therapy, surgery

Symptoms: Irregular periods, excess hair growth, acne, weight gain, infertility
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Lodhra (Symplocos racemosa), Ashoka (Saraca indica), Shatavari (Asparagus racemosus), Chandraprabha vati, Kanchanara guggulu
Homeopathic_Treatment: Pulsatilla (for menstrual irregularities), Sepia (for hormonal imbalance), Graphites (for skin issues), Calcarea carbonica (for metabolic issues)
Allopathic_Treatment: Combined oral contraceptives, anti-androgens, metformin, fertility treatments, lifestyle modifications

Symptoms: Fatigue, weight loss, darkening of skin, low blood pressure, nausea
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Ashwagandha (Withania somnifera), Bala (Sida cordifolia), Shatavari (Asparagus racemosus), Guduchi (Tinospora cordifolia)
Homeopathic_Treatment: Natrum muriaticum (for weakness with salt cravings), Arsenicum album (for exhaustion and anxiety), Phosphoric acid (for profound weakness)
Allopathic_Treatment: Corticosteroids (hydrocortisone, fludrocortisone), lifestyle adaptations, emergency protocols

Symptoms: Abdominal pain, nausea, vomiting, bloating, indigestion
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Amalaki (Indian gooseberry), Yashtimadhu (licorice), Shatavari (Asparagus racemosus), Guduchi (Tinospora cordifolia), dietary adjustments
Homeopathic_Treatment: Nux vomica (for burning pain and irritability), Arsenicum album (for burning pain with anxiety), Phosphorus (for burning pain with thirst), Carbo vegetabilis (for bloating)
Allopathic_Treatment: Proton pump inhibitors, H2 blockers, antacids, antibiotics (for H. pylori), dietary modifications

Symptoms: Burning stomach pain, feeling of fullness, bloating, heartburn, nausea
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Yashtimadhu (licorice), Shatavari (Asparagus racemosus), Amalaki (Indian gooseberry), dietary modifications, stress reduction
Homeopathic_Treatment: Nux vomica (for burning pain with irritability), Arsenicum album (for burning pain with anxiety), Phosphorus (for ulcers with bleeding tendency), Lycopodium (for right-sided symptoms)
Allopathic_Treatment: Proton pump inhibitors, H2 blockers, antibiotics (for H. pylori), cytoprotective agents, antacids

Disease: Inflammatory Bowel Disease (Crohn's and Ulcerative Colitis)
Symptoms: Abdominal pain, diarrhea (often bloody), fatigue, weight loss, reduced appetite
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Kutaja (Holarrhena antidysenterica), Bilva (Aegle marmelos), Nagkesar (Mesua ferrea), Lodhra (Symplocos racemosa), Panchakarma therapy
Homeopathic_Treatment: Mercurius corrosivus (for bloody diarrhea), Phosphorus (for bloody diarrhea with weakness), Arsenicum album (for burning pain with anxiety), Podophyllum (for painless diarrhea)
Allopathic_Treatment: Aminosalicylates, corticosteroids, immunomodulators, biologics, JAK inhibitors, surgery when necessary

Symptoms: Abdominal pain, bloating, gas, diarrhea or constipation, mucus in stool
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Fennel seeds, Jeeraka (cumin), Dhanyaka (coriander), Bilva (Aegle marmelos), stress management techniques, dietary modifications
Homeopathic_Treatment: Nux vomica (for irritability with constipation), Colocynthis (for cramping pain), Lycopodium (for bloating), Argentum nitricum (for diarrhea with anxiety)
Allopathic_Treatment: Antispasmodics, laxatives (for constipation), anti-diarrheals, antidepressants, probiotics, dietary modifications, stress management

Symptoms: Heartburn, regurgitation, difficulty swallowing, chest pain
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Amalaki (Indian gooseberry), Yashtimadhu (licorice), Shatavari (Asparagus racemosus), lifestyle and dietary modifications
Homeopathic_Treatment: Nux vomica (for acid reflux with irritability), Carbo vegetabilis (for bloating with burning), Arsenicum album (for burning pain with anxiety), Robinia (for intense acidity)
Allopathic_Treatment: Proton pump inhibitors, H2 blockers, antacids, lifestyle modifications, surgery in severe cases

Symptoms: Sudden pain in upper right abdomen, pain between shoulder blades, nausea, vomiting
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Amalaki (Indian gooseberry), Punarnava (Boerhavia diffusa), Kutki (Picrorhiza kurroa), Bhringaraj (Eclipta alba)
Homeopathic_Treatment: Chelidonium (for right-sided pain radiating to back), Berberis vulgaris (for radiating pain), China (for biliary colic), Lycopodium (for right-sided symptoms)
Allopathic_Treatment: Pain management, lithotripsy, dissolving medications (ursodiol), laparoscopic gallbladder removal

Symptoms: Jaundice, abdominal pain, fatigue, dark urine, clay-colored stools
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Kutki (Picrorhiza kurroa), Bhringaraj (Eclipta alba), Punarnava (Boerhavia diffusa), Kalmegh (Andrographis paniculata)
Homeopathic_Treatment: Chelidonium (for right-sided pain with jaundice), Phosphorus (for acute hepatitis), Lycopodium (for chronic hepatitis), Carduus marianus (for liver inflammation)
Allopathic_Treatment: Antivirals (for viral hepatitis), immunosuppressants (for autoimmune hepatitis), lifestyle modifications, liver transplant in severe cases

Symptoms: Severe upper abdominal pain radiating to back, nausea, vomiting, fever
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Amalaki (Indian gooseberry), Nimba (neem), Kutki (Picrorhiza kurroa), dietary restrictions, panchakarma therapy
Homeopathic_Treatment: Iris versicolor (for pancreatic inflammation), Arsenicum album (for burning pain with anxiety), Phosphorus (for inflammation with weakness), Carbo vegetabilis (for bloating)
Allopathic_Treatment: Pain management, IV fluids, fasting, antibiotics for infection, endoscopic procedures, surgery in severe cases

Symptoms: Throbbing headache (often one-sided), nausea, sensitivity to light/sound, visual disturbances
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Jatamansi (Nardostachys jatamansi), Brahmi (Bacopa monnieri), Shankhpushpi (Convolvulus pluricaulis), Shirashuladi Vajra Ras, cold oil applications
Homeopathic_Treatment: Belladonna (for throbbing headache), Natrum muriaticum (for headache with visual disturbances), Iris versicolor (for headache with nausea), Glonoinum (for violently throbbing headache)
Allopathic_Treatment: NSAIDs, triptans, anti-nausea medications, CGRP antagonists, preventive medications (beta-blockers, anticonvulsants, botox)

Symptoms: Seizures, temporary confusion, staring spells, uncontrollable jerking movements
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Brahmi (Bacopa monnieri), Shankhpushpi (Convolvulus pluricaulis), Jatamansi (Nardostachys jatamansi), Vacha (Acorus calamus), specialized diet
Homeopathic_Treatment: Cicuta virosa (for violent convulsions), Bufo rana (for epilepsy with sexual overtones), Cuprum metallicum (for severe cramping), Oenanthe crocata (for violent seizures)
Allopathic_Treatment: Anticonvulsant medications, ketogenic diet, vagus nerve stimulation, responsive neurostimulation, epilepsy surgery

Symptoms: Tremor, bradykinesia (slowness of movement), rigid muscles, impaired posture and balance
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Kapikacchu (Mucuna pruriens), Ashwagandha (Withania somnifera), Brahmi (Bacopa monnieri), Bala (Sida cordifolia)
Homeopathic_Treatment: Mercurius solubilis (for tremors with excess saliva), Plumbum metallicum (for tremors with hardness), Rhus toxicodendron (for stiffness better with movement), Causticum (for tremors with weakness)
Allopathic_Treatment: Levodopa, dopamine agonists, MAO-B inhibitors, COMT inhibitors, anticholinergics, deep brain stimulation

Symptoms: Fatigue, numbness/weakness in limbs, vision problems, coordination issues, slurred speech
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Ashwagandha (Withania somnifera), Brahmi (Bacopa monnieri), Guduchi (Tinospora cordifolia), Rasayana therapy, yoga
Homeopathic_Treatment: Gelsemium (for weakness and trembling), Phosphorus (for numbness and tingling), Argentum nitricum (for coordination problems), Alumina (for slow mental function)
Allopathic_Treatment: Disease-modifying therapies (interferons, glatiramer acetate, ocrelizumab), corticosteroids for flares, symptomatic treatments

Symptoms: Memory loss, confusion, difficulty with familiar tasks, language problems, personality changes
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Brahmi (Bacopa monnieri), Shankhpushpi (Convolvulus pluricaulis), Ashwagandha (Withania somnifera), Vacha (Acorus calamus), mental exercises
Homeopathic_Treatment: Alumina (for mental confusion), Baryta carbonica (for memory problems in elderly), Phosphorus (for mental decline with anxiety), Anacardium (for memory loss with irritability)
Allopathic_Treatment: Cholinesterase inhibitors, memantine, antidepressants, antipsychotics for behavioral symptoms, cognitive training

Symptoms: Severe headache, stiff neck, fever, confusion, sensitivity to light
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Guduchi (Tinospora cordifolia), Tulsi (Holy Basil), Kutki (Picrorhiza kurroa), cooling therapies
Homeopathic_Treatment: Belladonna (for violent headache with fever), Apis mellifica (for stinging pain with swelling), Bryonia (for pain worse with movement), Helleborus (for drowsiness with stiff neck)
Allopathic_Treatment: Antibiotics (for bacterial meningitis), antivirals (for viral meningitis), corticosteroids, anticonvulsants, supportive care

Symptoms: Excessive worry, restlessness, fatigue, difficulty concentrating, irritability, sleep problems
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Jatamansi (Nardostachys jatamansi), Brahmi (Bacopa monnieri), Ashwagandha (Withania somnifera), meditation, yoga, breathing exercises
Homeopathic_Treatment: Argentum nitricum (for anxiety with anticipation), Aconitum napellus (for panic attacks), Gelsemium (for anxiety with weakness), Phosphorus (for anxiety with fearfulness)
Allopathic_Treatment: Selective serotonin reuptake inhibitors (SSRIs), serotonin-norepinephrine reuptake inhibitors (SNRIs), benzodiazepines, cognitive behavioral therapy

Symptoms: Persistent sadness, loss of interest, sleep disturbances, fatigue, feelings of worthlessness
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Brahmi (Bacopa monnieri), Ashwagandha (Withania somnifera), Jatamansi (Nardostachys jatamansi), Shankhpushpi (Convolvulus pluricaulis), yoga, meditation
Homeopathic_Treatment: Aurum metallicum (for deep depression with suicidal thoughts), Natrum muriaticum (for depression with isolation), Ignatia (for depression after grief), Sepia (for indifference and irritability)
Allopathic_Treatment: Selective serotonin reuptake inhibitors (SSRIs), serotonin-norepinephrine reuptake inhibitors (SNRIs), tricyclic antidepressants, psychotherapy

Symptoms: Mood swings between depression and mania, changes in energy, activity, and sleep
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Brahmi (Bacopa monnieri), Jatamansi (Nardostachys jatamansi), Shankhpushpi (Convolvulus pluricaulis), Vacha (Acorus calamus), routine stabilization
Homeopathic_Treatment: Hyoscyamus (for mania with inappropriate behavior), Stramonium (for violent behavior), Veratrum album (for mania with grandiosity), Natrum sulphuricum (for mood swings)
Allopathic_Treatment: Mood stabilizers (lithium, valproate), antipsychotics, antidepressants, psychotherapy, electroconvulsive therapy

Symptoms: Hallucinations, delusions, disorganized thinking, reduced emotional expression, lack of motivation
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Brahmi (Bacopa monnieri), Shankhpushpi (Convolvulus pluricaulis), Jatamansi (Nardostachys jatamansi), Sarpagandha (Rauwolfia serpentina)
Homeopathic_Treatment: Hyoscyamus (for suspicious behavior), Stramonium (for violent behavior with hallucinations), Lachesis (for paranoia and suspicion), Anacardium (for contradiction between thoughts)
Allopathic_Treatment: Antipsychotics (typical and atypical), psychosocial interventions, vocational rehabilitation, family education and support

Symptoms: Flashbacks, nightmares, severe anxiety, uncontrollable thoughts about traumatic event
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Jatamansi (Nardostachys jatamansi), Brahmi (Bacopa monnieri), Ashwagandha (Withania somnifera), Shirodhara therapy, yoga nidra
Homeopathic_Treatment: Aconitum napellus (for fear and panic), Ignatia (for emotional trauma), Natrum muriaticum (for suppressed grief), Staphysagria (for suppressed anger)
Allopathic_Treatment: Selective serotonin reuptake inhibitors (SSRIs), prazosin (for nightmares), trauma-focused cognitive behavioral therapy, EMDR

Symptoms: Unwanted thoughts (obsessions), repetitive behaviors (compulsions), anxiety
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Shankhpushpi (Convolvulus pluricaulis), Brahmi (Bacopa monnieri), Jatamansi (Nardostachys jatamansi), meditation techniques
Homeopathic_Treatment: Arsenicum album (for fear of contamination), Silicea (for fixed ideas), Natrum muriaticum (for rigid thinking), Kali arsenicum (for anxiety with meticulousness)
Allopathic_Treatment: Selective serotonin reuptake inhibitors (SSRIs), exposure and response prevention therapy, cognitive behavioral therapy

Symptoms: Joint pain, swelling, and stiffness, particularly in hands and feet, fatigue, fever
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Shallaki (Boswellia serrata), Guggulu (Commiphora mukul), Rasna (Pluchea lanceolata), Nirgundi (Vitex negundo), Panchakarma therapy
Homeopathic_Treatment: Rhus toxicodendron (for stiffness better with movement), Bryonia (for pain worse with movement), Apis mellifica (for stinging pain with swelling), Kalmia latifolia (for migratory pain)
Allopathic_Treatment: Disease-modifying antirheumatic drugs (DMARDs), biologics, JAK inhibitors, corticosteroids, NSAIDs, physical therapy

Symptoms: Joint pain and stiffness, decreased range of motion, swelling, bone spurs

Homeopathic_Treatment: Rhus toxicodendron (for stiffness better with movement), Bryonia (for pain worse with movement), Ruta graveolens (for tendon and periosteum pain), Calcarea fluorica (for bone spurs)
Allopathic_Treatment: NSAIDs, acetaminophen, duloxetine, intra-articular corticosteroid injections, viscosupplementation, joint replacement surgery

Symptoms: Severe joint pain (especially big toe), swelling, redness, heat
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Guduchi (Tinospora cordifolia), Punarnava (Boerhavia diffusa), Gokshura (Tribulus terrestris), dietary modifications
Homeopathic_Treatment: Colchicum (for severe pain worse with movement), Ledum palustre (for ascending joint pain), Urtica urens (for stinging pain), Benzoic acid (for gout with strong-smelling urine)
Allopathic_Treatment: NSAIDs, colchicine, corticosteroids, xanthine oxidase inhibitors (allopurinol, febuxostat), uricosurics, lifestyle modifications

Symptoms: Widespread pain, fatigue, sleep problems, cognitive difficulties, headaches

Homeopathic_Treatment: Rhus toxicodendron (for stiffness better with movement), Bryonia (for pain worse with movement), Kalmia latifolia (for migratory pain), Cimicifuga (for muscular pain)
Allopathic_Treatment: Pregabalin, duloxetine, milnacipran, amitriptyline, physical therapy, cognitive behavioral therapy, exercise programs

Symptoms: Often asymptomatic until fractures occur; back pain, loss of height, stooped posture
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Godanti Bhasma, Praval Pishti, Laksha Guggulu, Asthishrinkhala (Cissus quadrangularis), strength-building yoga
Homeopathic_Treatment: Calcarea phosphorica (for bone weakness), Symphytum (for fracture healing), Calcarea fluorica (for bone elasticity), Silicea (for poor assimilation)
Allopathic_Treatment: Bisphosphonates, denosumab, teriparatide, raloxifene, calcium and vitamin D supplements, weight-bearing exercise

Symptoms: Lower back and hip pain, stiffness, reduced mobility in spine, fatigue

Homeopathic_Treatment: Rhus toxicodendron (for stiffness better with movement), Bryonia (for pain worse with movement), Kali carbonicum (for lower back weakness), Sulfur (for inflammatory conditions)
Allopathic_Treatment: NSAIDs, TNF inhibitors, IL-17 inhibitors, physical therapy, posture training, surgery in severe cases

Symptoms: Red, itchy, scaly patches on skin, most commonly on knees, elbows, trunk

Homeopathic_Treatment: Graphites (for thick skin eruptions), Arsenicum album (for dry scaly eruptions with burning), Petroleum (for cracked skin), Sulfur (for itchy, burning eruptions)
Allopathic_Treatment: Topical corticosteroids, vitamin D analogues, retinoids, coal tar, phototherapy, biologics, oral systemic medications

Symptoms: Dry, itchy, inflamed skin, rashes, oozing and crusting

Homeopathic_Treatment: Graphites (for weeping eruptions that crust over), Petroleum (for cracked skin), Sulfur (for itchy, burning eruptions), Rhus toxicodendron (for vesicular eruptions)

Symptoms: Pimples, blackheads, whiteheads, inflammation, scarring

Symptoms: Itchy, red, scaly patches, often in moist areas of body

Homeopathic_Treatment: Graphites (for moist eruptions between folds), Sepia (for ringworm), Sulfur (for burning, itchy eruptions), Bacillinum (for persistent infections)

Symptoms: Fever, chills, sweating, headache, nausea, vomiting, muscle pain

Symptoms: Irritability, sore gums, excessive drooling, mild fever, difficulty sleeping, reduced appetite, chewing on objects, cheek rubbing
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Dantshoolhara powder (mix of Yashtimadhu/licorice and Vacha/sweet flag) applied to gums, Erand Taila (castor oil) gently rubbed on gums, Haritaki chewable pieces, coconut oil massage around jawline
Homeopathic_Treatment: Chamomilla (for irritability and pain), Calcarea phosphorica (for delayed dentition), Belladonna (for inflammation with heat), Coffea (for pain with sleeplessness), Podophyllum (for teething with diarrhea)
Allopathic_Treatment: Topical analgesics (benzocaine gels), oral pain relievers (infant acetaminophen/ibuprofen), cold teething rings, clean wet washcloth for chewing

Symptoms: Prolonged crying (3+ hours a day), fussiness, facial redness, drawing up of legs, clenched fists, bloated abdomen
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Dill water, Saunf (fennel) water, Ajwain (carom seed) water, gentle stomach massage with warm sesame oil, Dashamoola drops, Hingwashtak churna in minimal doses
Homeopathic_Treatment: Colocynthis (for colic improved by bending over), Chamomilla (for extreme irritability), Dioscorea (for colic improved by stretching), Magnesia phosphorica (for spasmodic pain improved by heat), Carbo vegetabilis (for bloating with gas)
Allopathic_Treatment: Simethicone drops, probiotics, gentle movement/rocking, addressing feeding habits (burping, feeding position), modified diet if breastfeeding, specialized formulas if formula-fed

Symptoms: Nasal congestion, runny nose, sneezing, cough, sore throat, mild fever, reduced appetite
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Tulsi (Holy Basil) drops in honey, Marich (black pepper) and honey mix, Haldi (turmeric) milk, steam inhalation with Pudina (mint), Sitopaladi churna in small doses, Talisadi churna
Homeopathic_Treatment: Aconite (for sudden onset), Belladonna (for high fever with redness), Euphrasia (for watery eyes and runny nose), Pulsatilla (for thick yellow-green discharge with clingy behavior), Ferrum phosphoricum (for early stage infections)
Allopathic_Treatment: Nasal saline drops, humidifier, adequate fluids, rest, acetaminophen/ibuprofen for fever and discomfort (age-appropriate dosing), honey for cough in children over 1 year

Symptoms: Dry, itchy, inflamed skin patches, most commonly on face, behind ears, on scalp, hands, and in skin folds
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Nimba (neem) paste, Haridra (turmeric) with coconut oil, Manjistha (Rubia cordifolia), Guduchi (Tinospora cordifolia) internal formulations, Karanja oil applications, Triphala for internal cleansing
Homeopathic_Treatment: Graphites (for moist eczema that cracks and oozes), Petroleum (for dry cracked skin worse in winter), Sulfur (for itchy eruptions worse with heat), Rhus toxicodendron (for vesicular eruptions), Arsenicum album (for dry scaly eruptions with burning and anxiety)
Allopathic_Treatment: Emollients/moisturizers, topical corticosteroids (mild strength for children), topical calcineurin inhibitors, antihistamines for itching, wet wraps, identifying and avoiding triggers

Symptoms: Wheezing, coughing (especially at night), shortness of breath, chest tightness, rapid breathing, anxiety
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Vasaka (Adhatoda vasica) syrup, Kantakari (Solanum xanthocarpum), simple breathing exercises, Chyawanprash, Talisadi churna, Sitopaladi churna, Yashtimadhu (licorice) syrup
Homeopathic_Treatment: Arsenicum album (for anxiety with breathing difficulty), Ipecacuanha (for cough with nausea), Natrum sulphuricum (for asthma worsened by humidity), Antimonium tartaricum (for rattling mucus)
Allopathic_Treatment: Inhaled corticosteroids, short-acting bronchodilators (rescue inhalers), leukotriene modifiers, combination inhalers, identifying and avoiding triggers, action plan for exacerbations

Symptoms: Itchy red rash that becomes fluid-filled blisters, fever, fatigue, headache, loss of appetite
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Neem (Azadirachta indica) bath and applications, Manjistha (Rubia cordifolia), Guduchi (Tinospora cordifolia), cooling pastes of sandalwood, turmeric, and aloe vera, Tikta Ghrita
Homeopathic_Treatment: Antimonium tartaricum (for pustule formation), Rhus toxicodendron (for intense itching worse at night), Pulsatilla (for mild cases with weepiness), Apis mellifica (for swelling and stinging pains)
Allopathic_Treatment: Acetaminophen for fever (avoid aspirin), calamine lotion, antihistamines for itching, cool baths with colloidal oatmeal, keeping nails short, adequate hydration, varicella vaccine for prevention

Symptoms: Ear pain, irritability, tugging at ears, difficulty sleeping, fever, hearing difficulties, balance problems
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Garlic oil ear drops (not directly in ear if perforated), Tulsi (Holy Basil) juice with honey, Bilva (Aegle marmelos) root decoction, warming compresses with sesame oil
Homeopathic_Treatment: Belladonna (for sudden intense pain with redness), Pulsatilla (for thick yellow discharge with weepiness), Chamomilla (for extreme irritability with pain), Hepar sulphuris (for extreme sensitivity to cold and touch)
Allopathic_Treatment: Antibiotics for bacterial infections, pain relievers (acetaminophen/ibuprofen), warm compresses, evaluation for ear tubes in recurrent cases, watchful waiting approach in mild cases

Symptoms: Swollen salivary glands, fever, headache, muscle aches, fatigue, loss of appetite
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Aragwadha (Cassia fistula) paste externally, Yashtimadhu (licorice) with honey, Amalaki (Indian gooseberry) juice, warm Turmeric milk, Guduchi (Tinospora cordifolia)
Homeopathic_Treatment: Belladonna (for bright red inflammation with throbbing), Mercurius solubilis (for excessive salivation), Phytolacca (for hard painful glands), Pulsatilla (for mild cases with weepiness)
Allopathic_Treatment: Pain relievers (acetaminophen/ibuprofen), applying warm or cold compresses, soft foods, adequate hydration, rest, MMR vaccine for prevention

Symptoms: Red blotchy rash, high fever, cough, runny nose, red watery eyes, white spots inside mouth, malaise
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Guduchi (Tinospora cordifolia), Neem (Azadirachta indica), Tulsi (Holy Basil), cooling herbs like Coriander and Sandalwood, Yashtimadhu (licorice) syrup
Homeopathic_Treatment: Aconite (for early stages with fever), Belladonna (for high fever with redness), Euphrasia (for watery eyes and runny nose), Pulsatilla (for mild cases with tearfulness)
Allopathic_Treatment: Vitamin A supplementation, fever reducers (acetaminophen/ibuprofen), adequate hydration, rest, humidified air, MMR vaccine for prevention

Symptoms: Loose watery stools, abdominal pain/cramping, fever, dehydration, urgency, blood or mucus in stool
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Kutaja (Holarrhena antidysenterica), Nutmeg and Mango seed paste, Bilva (Aegle marmelos), Dadima (pomegranate) peel decoction, Musli (Curculigo orchioides)
Homeopathic_Treatment: Podophyllum (for painless, profuse, offensive diarrhea), Chamomilla (for diarrhea during teething with irritability), Arsenicum album (for burning diarrhea with anxiety), Veratrum album (for profuse watery diarrhea with coldness), China officinalis (for diarrhea causing weakness)
Allopathic_Treatment: Oral rehydration solution, probiotics, zinc supplements, continued feeding during illness, antimicrobials if bacterial or parasitic, anti-diarrheals generally not recommended for children

Symptoms: Sore throat, swollen tonsils, difficulty swallowing, fever, headache, ear pain, swollen lymph nodes, fatigue
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Yashtimadhu (licorice) with honey, Turmeric milk, Tulsi (Holy Basil) tea, Haritaki gargle, Triphala gargle, Bibhitaki (Terminalia bellirica)
Homeopathic_Treatment: Belladonna (for bright red tonsils with throbbing), Hepar sulphuris (for sharp splinter-like pain), Mercurius solubilis (for bad breath and excessive salivation), Phytolacca (for dark red throat with shooting pains to ears)
Allopathic_Treatment: Antibiotics for bacterial infections, pain relievers (acetaminophen/ibuprofen), warm salt water gargles (for older children), adequate hydration, rest, tonsillectomy for recurrent severe cases

Symptoms: Red/pink eye, eye discharge, tearing, itching, burning, blurred vision, light sensitivity
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Triphala eye wash (diluted), Rose water compresses, Haridra (turmeric) with milk externally, Amalaki (Indian gooseberry), Yashtimadhu (licorice) internally
Homeopathic_Treatment: Euphrasia (for watery irritated eyes), Apis mellifica (for swelling with stinging pain), Argentum nitricum (for thick purulent discharge), Pulsatilla (for yellow-green discharge better in open air)
Allopathic_Treatment: Bacterial: antibiotic eye drops; Viral: artificial tears, cold compresses; Allergic: antihistamine eye drops; Hygiene measures, avoiding touching eyes, separate towels/pillowcases

Symptoms: Inattention, hyperactivity, impulsivity, difficulty focusing, fidgeting, interrupting, difficulty organizing tasks
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Brahmi (Bacopa monnieri), Shankhpushpi (Convolvulus pluricaulis), Ashwagandha (Withania somnifera), Yashtimadhu (licorice), meditation and yoga practices
Homeopathic_Treatment: Tarentula hispanica (for restlessness), Cina (for irritability with worm symptoms), Hyoscyamus (for impulsivity), Stramonium (for hyperactivity with fearfulness), Verta alb (for restlessness with anxiety)
Allopathic_Treatment: Stimulant medications (methylphenidate, amphetamine derivatives), non-stimulants (atomoxetine, guanfacine), behavioral therapy, parent training, educational support, routine establishment

Symptoms: Social communication challenges, repetitive behaviors, restricted interests, sensory sensitivities, speech delays, difficulty with transitions
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Brahmi (Bacopa monnieri), Shankhpushpi (Convolvulus pluricaulis), Ashwagandha (Withania somnifera), Shirodhara therapy, sensory integration activities, specialized massage
Homeopathic_Treatment: Baryta carbonica (for developmental delays), Carcinosin (for developmental issues), Natrum muriaticum (for withdrawn children), Stramonium (for fearfulness), Saccharum officinale (for craving sweets with developmental issues)
Allopathic_Treatment: Behavioral therapies (Applied Behavioral Analysis), speech therapy, occupational therapy, social skills training, special education services, medications for specific symptoms (irritability, hyperactivity)

Symptoms: BMI at or above 95th percentile for age and sex, excessive weight gain, early puberty, sleep apnea, joint problems, psychological issues
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Triphala, Haritaki, Guggulu, Medohar formulations, physical activity regimens, diet modifications emphasizing whole foods, mindful eating practices
Homeopathic_Treatment: Calcarea carbonica (for slow metabolism), Graphites (for obesity with skin issues), Lycopodium (for bloating and eating disorders), Natrum muriaticum (for emotional eating), Phytolacca (for metabolic support)
Allopathic_Treatment: Dietary modifications, increased physical activity, reduced screen time, family-based interventions, behavioral therapy, treatment of underlying conditions, rarely medication or surgery for severe cases

Symptoms: Increased thirst/hunger, frequent urination, weight loss, fatigue, blurred vision, mood changes
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Gudmar (Gymnema sylvestre), Jamun (Syzygium cumini), Amla (Indian gooseberry), Neem (Azadirachta indica), Methika (fenugreek), lifestyle and dietary support
Homeopathic_Treatment: Uranium nitricum (for excessive urination and sugar), Phosphoric acid (for weakness), Syzygium jambolanum (for pancreatic support), Abroma augusta (for diabetic symptoms)
Allopathic_Treatment: Insulin therapy (basal-bolus regimen), blood glucose monitoring, carbohydrate counting, lifestyle management, regular medical follow-up, patient/family education, technology (insulin pumps, continuous glucose monitors)

Symptoms: Seizures triggered by fever, loss of consciousness, stiff/jerking limbs, eye rolling, brief post-seizure drowsiness
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Brahmi (Bacopa monnieri), Shankhpushpi (Convolvulus pluricaulis), Vacha (Acorus calamus) in minimal doses, cooling herbs like Coriander and Sandalwood
Homeopathic_Treatment: Belladonna (for sudden high fever with bright red face), Aconite (for seizures from fright), Cuprum metallicum (for severe cramping), Bufo rana (for epileptic seizures)
Allopathic_Treatment: Fever reduction (acetaminophen/ibuprofen), positioning child safely during seizure, medical evaluation after first seizure, rarely anticonvulsants for recurrent or complex cases

Symptoms: Joint pain, swelling, stiffness, fatigue, limited mobility, rash, fever, lymph node enlargement
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Shallaki (Boswellia serrata), Guggulu (Commiphora mukul), Ashwagandha (Withania somnifera), Rasna (Pluchea lanceolata), gentle oil massage
Homeopathic_Treatment: Rhus toxicodendron (for stiffness better with movement), Bryonia (for pain worse with movement), Apis mellifica (for hot swollen joints), Pulsatilla (for wandering pains)
Allopathic_Treatment: NSAIDs, DMARDs, corticosteroids, biologics, physical/occupational therapy, regular eye examinations, adequate nutrition and calcium, psychological support

Symptoms: Excessive worry, school refusal, somatic complaints (headaches, stomachaches), sleep problems, irritability, fear of separation
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Jatamansi (Nardostachys jatamansi), Brahmi (Bacopa monnieri), Ashwagandha (Withania somnifera), gentle Shirodhara, child-appropriate meditation
Homeopathic_Treatment: Argentum nitricum (for anticipatory anxiety), Gelsemium (for performance anxiety with weakness), Phosphorus (for anxiety with fearfulness), Pulsatilla (for clingy behavior), Aconite (for panic attacks)
Allopathic_Treatment: Cognitive-behavioral therapy, family therapy, relaxation techniques, school accommodations, selective serotonin reuptake inhibitors (SSRIs) for severe cases, parent training

Symptoms: Late talking, limited vocabulary, difficulty forming sentences, trouble understanding speech, frustration with communication
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Brahmi (Bacopa monnieri), Shankhpushpi (Convolvulus pluricaulis), Ashwagandha (Withania somnifera), Vacha (Acorus calamus) in minimal doses, Saraswatarishta
Homeopathic_Treatment: Baryta carbonica (for developmental delays), Calcarea phosphorica (for slow development), Natrum muriaticum (for speech delays with sensitivity), Carcinosin (for developmental issues)
Allopathic_Treatment: Speech and language therapy, early intervention services, auditory processing evaluation, parent training in language facilitation techniques, addressing any underlying issues (hearing, etc.)

Symptoms: Height/weight below 3rd percentile or significant drop in growth curve, delayed puberty, disproportionate body parts
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Ashwagandha (Withania somnifera), Shatavari (Asparagus racemosus), Bala (Sida cordifolia), Yashtimadhu (licorice), Mineral Bhasmas, Chyawanprash
Homeopathic_Treatment: Calcarea phosphorica (for bone development), Baryta carbonica (for delayed development), Silicea (for poor assimilation of nutrients), Phosphorus (for tall thin children with weakness)
Allopathic_Treatment: Evaluation for underlying causes, nutritional intervention, growth hormone therapy for specific conditions, treatment of any underlying medical conditions, regular monitoring

Symptoms: Runny nose, decrease in appetite, coughing, sneezing, fever, wheezing, labored breathing, nostril flaring, chest retractions
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Tulsi (Holy Basil), Vasa (Adhatoda vasica), Kantakari (Solanum xanthocarpum), Pushkarmool (Inula racemosa), honey with ginger for older children
Homeopathic_Treatment: Antimonium tartaricum (for rattling mucus), Drosera (for barking cough), Ipecacuanha (for cough with nausea), Kali bichromicum (for thick stringy mucus)
Allopathic_Treatment: Supportive care, adequate hydration, suction of nasal secretions, humidified air, oxygen therapy if needed, rarely antiviral medications, monoclonal antibody prophylaxis for high-risk infants

Symptoms: Red sores that break open and crust over (honey-colored crust), primarily on face around nose and mouth
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Haridra (turmeric) paste, Nimba (neem) applications, Triphala wash, Manjistha (Rubia cordifolia) internally, Chandana (sandalwood) applications
Homeopathic_Treatment: Antimonium crudum (for thick crusty eruptions), Arsenicum album (for burning painful lesions), Graphites (for oozing eruptions that crust), Hepar sulphuris (for extremely painful skin infections)
Allopathic_Treatment: Topical antibiotics (mupirocin) for limited infections, oral antibiotics for widespread cases, gentle cleansing, preventing spread through hygiene measures

Symptoms: and Mouth Disease
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Infectious
Homeopathic_Treatment: Painful mouth sores, skin rash on hands and feet, fever, sore throat, irritability, loss of appetite
Allopathic_Treatment: Yashtimadhu (licorice) with honey, Guduchi (Tinospora cordifolia), cooling herbs, Amalaki (Indian gooseberry), Triphala mouthwash
FIELD7: Belladonna (for fever with bright red eruptions), Mercurius solubilis (for mouth ulcers with excessive salivation), Antimonium crudum (for white-coated tongue), Borax (for mouth ulcers with extreme sensitivity)
FIELD8: Supportive care, pain relievers (acetaminophen/ibuprofen), cold fluids and soft foods, adequate hydration, saltwater rinses for older children

Symptoms: Persistent high fever, rash, red eyes, red lips/tongue, swollen hands/feet, lymph node enlargement, irritability
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Guduchi (Tinospora cordifolia), cooling herbs, Shatavari (Asparagus racemosus), anti-inflammatory herbs, supportive care
Homeopathic_Treatment: Aconite (for sudden onset with fever), Belladonna (for high fever with redness), Apis mellifica (for swelling with stinging), Rhus toxicodendron (for restlessness)
Allopathic_Treatment: Intravenous immunoglobulin (IVIG), aspirin therapy, corticosteroids, echocardiogram monitoring, supportive care, long-term cardiac follow-up

Symptoms: Red rash that feels like sandpaper, sore throat, high fever, strawberry tongue, flushed face with pale ring around mouth
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Guduchi (Tinospora cordifolia), Yashtimadhu (licorice) with honey, cooling herbs, Neem (Azadirachta indica), Triphala
Homeopathic_Treatment: Belladonna (for bright red skin with fever), Apis mellifica (for swelling with stinging), Rhus toxicodendron (for restlessness with red rash), Mercurius solubilis (for throat inflammation with excessive salivation)
Allopathic_Treatment: Antibiotics (penicillin/amoxicillin), fever reducers (acetaminophen/ibuprofen), adequate hydration, soft foods for sore throat, rest

Symptoms: Red, inflamed skin in diaper area, scaling, small red bumps or blisters, discomfort, crying during diaper changes
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Yashtimadhu (licorice) paste, Haridra (turmeric) with coconut oil, Triphala wash, Amalaki (Indian gooseberry) paste, Ghee applications
Homeopathic_Treatment: Calendula (for raw skin), Graphites (for moist eczematous conditions), Medorrhinum (for persistent diaper rash), Sulphur (for red burning rash), Borax (for rash with sensitivity)
Allopathic_Treatment: Frequent diaper changes, gentle cleaning, allowing skin to dry, zinc oxide cream, antifungal creams for yeast infections, brief diaper-free time, avoiding irritants in wipes/diapers

Symptoms: Impaired movement, abnormal reflexes, floppiness or rigidity of limbs, abnormal posture, involuntary movements, delays in motor skills
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Ashwagandha (Withania somnifera), Brahmi (Bacopa monnieri), Bala (Sida cordifolia), specialized Snehana and Swedana (oil massage and steam), Nasya therapy
Homeopathic_Treatment: Agaricus (for involuntary movements), Cicuta virosa (for convulsions), Causticum (for paralysis and contractures), Helleborus (for dullness and slow response)
Allopathic_Treatment: Physical therapy, occupational therapy, speech therapy, medications for spasticity (baclofen, botulinum toxin), orthopedic surgery when needed, assistive devices, special education services

Symptoms: Weight below 3rd percentile or crossing downward on growth chart, delayed developmental milestones, fatigue, irritability, decreased activity levels
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Shatavari (Asparagus racemosus), Ashwagandha (Withania somnifera), Bala (Sida cordifolia), Chyawanprash, specialized nutritional formulations
Homeopathic_Treatment: Calcarea phosphorica (for poor growth), Natrum muriaticum (for poor weight gain despite eating), Silicea (for poor assimilation), Iodum (for rapid metabolism), Abrotanum (for malnutrition)
Allopathic_Treatment: Identifying and treating underlying conditions, high-calorie diet, nutritional supplements, feeding therapy, parental education, hospitalization in severe cases, regular growth monitoring

Symptoms: Bright red rash on cheeks ('slapped cheek' appearance), lacy red rash on trunk and limbs, low-grade fever, headache, sore throat
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Guduchi (Tinospora cordifolia), Tulsi (Holy Basil), cooling herbs, Neem (Azadirachta indica), Chandan (sandalwood)
Homeopathic_Treatment: Belladonna (for bright red rash with heat), Rhus toxicodendron (for itchy rash), Pulsatilla (for rash with weepiness), Apis mellifica (for swelling with stinging)
Allopathic_Treatment: Supportive care, acetaminophen/ibuprofen for fever or discomfort, adequate hydration, rest, monitoring of complications in at-risk groups

Symptoms: Abdominal pain, diarrhea, bloating, weight loss, irritability, delayed growth, fatigue, anemia
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Haritaki, Guduchi (Tinospora cordifolia), Amalaki (Indian gooseberry), specialized diet modifications, digestive herbs
Homeopathic_Treatment: Natrum muriaticum (for malabsorption), Phosphorus (for malnutrition), Arsenicum album (for digestive burning), Lycopodium (for bloating and digestive weakness)
Allopathic_Treatment: Strict gluten-free diet, nutritional supplements (iron, calcium, folate, vitamin D, B12), monitoring for complications, education on gluten-free living

Symptoms: Uneven shoulders, one prominent shoulder blade, uneven waist, elevated hip, leaning to one side
Ayurvedic_Treatment: Ashwagandha (Withania somnifera), Rasna (Pluchea lanceolata), Nirgundi (Vitex negundo), specialized oil massage, specific yoga asanas
Homeopathic_Treatment: Calcarea phosphorica (for bone development), Phosphorus (for spine issues), Silicea (for structural support), Thuja occidentalis (for asymmetrical growth)
Allopathic_Treatment: Observation for mild cases, bracing for moderate cases, surgery for severe cases, physical therapy, regular monitoring during growth periods
